name: div
features: Protective: Soft-shell leg protector hardens on impact to absorb & reduce damage from hit-by-pitches
Dual Leg Utility: Adjustable design fits both left-handed & right-handed hitters
Ankle + Foot Extension: Extended protection from shin through ankle & toes for full lower-leg coverage
Form Fitting: Pre-curved, flexible interior shell molds to the unique shape of your leg over time
Lightweight: Sleek, non-bulky design for comfort & freedom of movement at the plate
